mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_schedule(semester, course_id, teacher_id, classroom, capacity, class_time) VALUES (#{semester}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{classroom}, #{capacity}, #{classTime});
mapper.select: SELECT cs.course_id as courseId, c.course_name as courseName, c.credit, cs.teacher_id as teacherId, cs.class_time as classTime, cs.classroom, cs.capacity FROM class_schedule cs JOIN course c ON c.course_id = cs.course_id WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId}
